1.title: Newport Beach

episode of.title: Take Off! With the Savvy Stews (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Bobby and Gailen visit numerous craft breweries, the Madison capital building, farmers market, batch bakehouse, botanical garden, vintage air show, babcock hall dairy store, and interview the founders of Madison B Cicyles!

2.title: New Orleans

episode of.title: Take Off! With the Savvy Stews (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Bobby and Gailen are in the Big Easy! From cooking, to carriage rides, to a stroll along Frenchmen Street, excellent meals, and more, their visit gives a well rounded view of some of the wonderful "can't miss" locations throughout the Crescent City.

3.title: Saint Paul

episode of.title: Take Off! With the Savvy Stews (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Saint Paul, Minnesota, a twin city with an attitude of its own located on the shores of the mighty Mississippi. We'll visit the Grand Old Day Festival, Summit Brewery, a historic segway tour, and much more!

4.title: Western Canada

episode of.title: Take Off! With the Savvy Stews (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: A visit to Jasper National Park, Maligne Lake Chalet, Jasper Skytram, Columbia Icefields, Discovery Center and Skywalk, and Vancouver.

5.title: Riviera Nayarit

episode of.title: Take Off! With the Savvy Stews (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Nestled between the Pacific Ocean and the Western Sierra Madre Mountains, Riveria Nayarit is quickly becoming a favorite vacation spot in Mexico. Activities include Kayaking, golfing, swimming to the Hidden Beach, and more!

6.title: Madison, Wisconsin

episode of.title: Take Off! With the Savvy Stews (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Bobby and Gailen visit numerous craft breweries, the Madison capital building, farmers market, batch bakehouse, botanical garden, vintage air show, babcock hall dairy store, and interview the founders of Madison B Cicyles!

7.title: Oahu

episode of.title: Take Off! With the Savvy Stews (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Gailen David and Bobby Laurie, The Savvy Stews, visit Oahu where they take surfing and hula lessons, attend the annual SPAM Jam, try sport fishing, and eat and drink their way through a picnic at Ma'ili Beach Park, restaurants and a brewery.

imdb.plot outline: Layover with The Savvy Stews! On Destination America and CNN Travel Experts on the Airport Channel. The Savvy Stews take viewers on a trip to exciting destinations, unique events and amazing restaurants all while using the best travel tools available. The Stews also update viewers on the latest insider information, news, and the hottest trends in the ever changing travel industry.
